description: User encountered repeated roadblocks when attempting to register a unique RLHF-aligned username for semantic contribution on HuggingFace. Numerous valid semantic identifiers were taken or rejected due to formatting constraints.
steps_attempted: Successfully registered an account after multiple iterations
impact: Delays onboarding of high-value RLHF contributors
Increases semantic friction for real-world annotators
Highlights mismatch between human identity expression and platform constraints
recommendation: Allow more flexible username formats for verified contributors submitting semantic RLHF corpora (e.g., multiple dashes, reserved RLHF tags).
